{{cpp/keyword/title|{{tt|break}}}}
{{cpp/keyword/navbar}}

===Usage===
* [[cpp/language/break|{{tt|break}} statement]]: as the declaration of the statement

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;

int main() noexcept
{
    for (int i{0}; i &lt; 69; ++i)
    {
        if (i == 3) [[unlikely]]
            break; // breaks from the 'for' loop
        std::cout &lt;&lt; i;
    }
}
|p=false
|output=
012
}}
